resources.string: Twixter is an app that allows you to interact with Twitter via text while giving the appearance that you\'re browsing normally. You can see how many texts you\'ve used today on the homepage.

Select the action you\'d like to take on the homepage. Type your tweet, message, or search keyword - then hit send. Twixter will send your message on your behalf. If you searched for a term or clicked on feed, you\'ll be able to see the tweets you requested.
